metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16487 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A prototype pollution vulnerability was found in lodash <4.17.11 where the functions merge, mergeWith, and defaultsDeep can be tricked into adding or modifying properties of Object.prototype.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-16487` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-lodash - 4.17.11+dfsg-4
node-lodash - 4.17.11+dfsg-4
node-lodash-packages - 4.17.11+dfsg-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-lodash package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.17.11+dfsg-4').
